scenes.opening_scene: You find yourself in a space ship. The surrounding are unfamiliar to you. You decide to make your way forward.
scenes.final_scene: You've reached the final room and gained control of the ship.

rooms: Bridge
The command center of the spaceship.
Engine Room
The heart of the spaceship, filled with advanced machinery.
Cargo Bay
A large storage area for supplies and equipment.
Armory
Secure room stocked with weapons and protective gear.
Crew Quarters
Personal living spaces for the crew members.
Mess Hall
A communal area where the crew gathers to eat and relax.
Medical Bay
Equipped with medical supplies and equipment for treating injuries.
Research Lab
A high-tech lab for scientific experiments and analysis.
Security Office
The monitoring center for the spaceship's security systems.
Server Room
Contains the main computers and data storage units.
Observation Deck
A room with large windows to view space and nearby celestial bodies.
Gym
A facility for the crew to maintain physical fitness.
Airlock
An entry-exit point for spacewalks and docking ships.
Prisoner Cells
Secured area for detaining unauthorized persons or prisoners.
Maintenance Tunnel
Narrow passages for accessing and repairing ship systems.
Communications Center
The hub for internal and external communications.
Hydroponics Bay
A room dedicated to growing plants and vegetables.
Laboratory
Used for various scientific and technological research.
Drone Control Room
Central control for operating and monitoring drones.
Engineering Workshop
A place for repairing and constructing mechanical equipment.
Escape Pods
Small vessels used for emergency evacuation.
game_items: Alien Artifact
A mysterious relic from an unknown civilization.
Biometric Scanner
Used for identifying individuals through biological characteristics.
Captain's Keycard
Grants access to restricted areas like the bridge or captain's quarters.
Communication Relay
A device to enhance the ship's long-range communication capabilities.
Data Pad
A personal device for accessing and storing digital information.
Encryption Key
A digital key used for decrypting secure data.
Energy Shield
A portable shield generating a protective energy barrier.
Engineer's Passcode
A numerical code required to access the engine room and related systems.
Environmental Suit
Provides protection against hazardous environments and extreme temperatures.
Food Rations
Pre-packaged meals sufficient for sustaining a person for several days.
Holographic Map
A detailed map of the spaceship, showing all rooms and corridors.
Hydrospanner
A multipurpose tool used in mechanical and electronic repairs.
Laser Pistol
A standard-issue sidearm for space combat. Effective against unarmored targets.
Medkit
Contains essential medical supplies for treating injuries.
Oxygen Tank
A portable supply of oxygen for breathing in space or oxygen-deprived environments.
Security Override Module
A device capable of bypassing security protocols and unlocking doors.
Spacesuit
A suit designed for extravehicular activities in space.
Tool Kit
Contains various tools for repairing and maintaining spaceship systems.
Welding Torch
Used for cutting through metal or welding components.
Zero-G Boots
Footwear equipped with magnetic soles to walk in zero gravity environments.
